question:
Write in chronological order:
(i) ‘Man’s landing on moon
(ii) Discovery of radio activity
(iii) First nuclear explosion
(iv) Launching of first satellite by India
explanation:
• Man’s landing on moon -20 July 1969
• Discovery of radio activity -The discovery of radioactivity took place over several years beginning with the discovery of x-rays in 1895 by Wilhelm Conrad Roentgen.
• The first man made nuclear explosion occurred on July 16, 1945 at 5:50 am on the Trinity Test Site near Alamogordo, New Mexico in the United States, an area now known as the White Sands Missile Range.
• Launching of first satellite by India- ISRO built India\'s first satellite, Aryabhata, which was launched by the Soviet Union on 19 April 1975.
